pages.text: The Prickly Belt is a handy trinket, able to store potion effects.$(br)When the wearer of the Belt is harmed, they will receive positive and neutral potion effects stored in the Belt. If a negative effect is stored in the Belt, it will instead be applied to the attacker, if present.$(br)Either way, this requires a tiny bit of ME.
To add a potion effect, simply combine the Belt with a Potion. The amount of uses is based off on both duration and amplifier of the used potion.$(br2)You can equip this in the Belt trinket slot.
